segment.source: The Descriptions section of the app submission process is where you provide the text and images that customers will see in your app's Store listing.
segment.target: The Descriptions section of the app submission process is where you provide the text and images that customers will see in your app's Store listing.

segment.source: Create app descriptions
segment.target: Create app descriptions

segment.source: Create app descriptions
segment.target: Create app descriptions

segment.source: The Descriptions section of the app submission process is where you provide the text and images that customers will see in your app's Store listing.
segment.target: The Descriptions section of the app submission process is where you provide the text and images that customers will see in your app's Store listing.

segment.source: Many of the fields in the Description are optional, but we suggest providing multiple images and as much info as possible to make your listing stand out.
segment.target: Many of the fields in the Description are optional, but we suggest providing multiple images and as much info as possible to make your listing stand out.

segment.source: The minimum required for the Description step to be considered complete is a text description and at least one screenshot.
segment.target: The minimum required for the Description step to be considered complete is a text description and at least one screenshot.

segment.source: By default, we'll use the same description (per language) for all of your targeted operating systems.
segment.target: By default, we'll use the same description (per language) for all of your targeted operating systems.

segment.source: If you'd like to use a customized description for a specific operating system, you can create platform-specific descriptions.
segment.target: If you'd like to use a customized description for a specific operating system, you can create platform-specific descriptions.

segment.source: Description languages
segment.target: Description languages

segment.source: You must complete the Description page for at least one language.
segment.target: You must complete the Description page for at least one language.

segment.source: We recommend providing a description in each language that your packages support, but you have flexibility to remove languages for which you don’t wish to provide a description.
segment.target: We recommend providing a description in each language that your packages support, but you have flexibility to remove languages for which you don’t wish to provide a description.

segment.source: You can also provide descriptions in additional languages which aren’t supported by your packages.
segment.target: You can also provide descriptions in additional languages which aren’t supported by your packages.

segment.source: Note If your submission includes packages already, we’ll show the languages supported in your packages on the submission overview page (unless you remove any of them).
segment.target: Note If your submission includes packages already, we’ll show the languages supported in your packages on the submission overview page (unless you remove any of them).

segment.source: To add or remove languages for your descriptions, click Manage description languages from the submission overview page.
segment.target: To add or remove languages for your descriptions, click Manage description languages from the submission overview page.

segment.source: If you‘ve already uploaded packages, you’ll see their languages listed in the Languages supported by your packages section.
segment.target: If you‘ve already uploaded packages, you’ll see their languages listed in the Languages supported by your packages section.

segment.source: To remove one or more of these languages, click Remove.
segment.target: To remove one or more of these languages, click Remove.

segment.source: If you later decide you want to provide a description that you previously removed, click Add to restore it.
segment.target: If you later decide you want to provide a description that you previously removed, click Add to restore it.

segment.source: In the Additional description languages section, you can click Manage additional languages to add or remove languages that are not included in your packages.
segment.target: In the Additional description languages section, you can click Manage additional languages to add or remove languages that are not included in your packages.

segment.source: Check the boxes for the languages that you’d like to add, then click Update.
segment.target: Check the boxes for the languages that you’d like to add, then click Update.

segment.source: The languages you’ve selected will be displayed in the Additional description languages section.
segment.target: The languages you’ve selected will be displayed in the Additional description languages section.

segment.source: To remove one or more of these languages, click Remove (or click Manage additional languages and uncheck the box for languages you’d like to remove).
segment.target: To remove one or more of these languages, click Remove (or click Manage additional languages and uncheck the box for languages you’d like to remove).

segment.source: When you have finished making your selections, click Save to return to the submission overview page.
segment.target: When you have finished making your selections, click Save to return to the submission overview page.

segment.source: Note When creating a description in a language that isn't supported by your packages, you'll need to indicate which of your reserved app names should be displayed in that description, since there isn't an associated package in that language from which to pull the name.
segment.target: Note When creating a description in a language that isn't supported by your packages, you'll need to indicate which of your reserved app names should be displayed in that description, since there isn't an associated package in that language from which to pull the name.

segment.source: The name you choose here only applies to the Store listing for this language and does not impact the name displayed when a customer installs the app.
segment.target: The name you choose here only applies to the Store listing for this language and does not impact the name displayed when a customer installs the app.

segment.source: To edit a description, click the language name from the Submission overview.
segment.target: To edit a description, click the language name from the Submission overview.

segment.source: The sections of the Description page are described below.
segment.target: The sections of the Description page are described below.

segment.source: Default description fields
segment.target: Default description fields

segment.source: At the top of the Description page, we show you the fields associated with your Default description.
segment.target: At the top of the Description page, we show you the fields associated with your Default description.

segment.source: These fields will be shown to all of your customers, unless you create platform-specific descriptions.
segment.target: These fields will be shown to all of your customers, unless you create platform-specific descriptions.

segment.source: If you do so, you'll see these fields repeated under section headings for each targeted OS for which you've created a platform-specific description, underneath your Default description (which will be displayed to customers on Windows 10, as well as customers on any OS that your app supports for which you haven't created a custom description).
segment.target: If you do so, you'll see these fields repeated under section headings for each targeted OS for which you've created a platform-specific description, underneath your Default description (which will be displayed to customers on Windows 10, as well as customers on any OS that your app supports for which you haven't created a custom description).

segment.source: Make sure each field in the Default description section is filled out with all the info you want to display to your app's customers (even if you want some of these fields to show the same info across different operating systems).
segment.target: Make sure each field in the Default description section is filled out with all the info you want to display to your app's customers (even if you want some of these fields to show the same info across different operating systems).

segment.source: For more info, see Create platform-specific descriptions.
segment.target: For more info, see Create platform-specific descriptions.

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: The description field is where you can tell customers what your app does.
segment.target: The description field is where you can tell customers what your app does.

segment.source: This field is required, and will accept up to 10,000 characters of plain text.
segment.target: This field is required, and will accept up to 10,000 characters of plain text.

segment.source: For some tips on making your description stand out, see Write a great app description.
segment.target: For some tips on making your description stand out, see Write a great app description.

segment.source: Release notes
segment.target: Release notes

segment.source: If this is the first time you're submitting your app, you'll probably want to leave this field blank.
segment.target: If this is the first time you're submitting your app, you'll probably want to leave this field blank.

segment.source: For an update to an existing app, this is where you can let customer know what's changed in the latest release.
segment.target: For an update to an existing app, this is where you can let customer know what's changed in the latest release.

segment.source: This field has a 1500 character limit.
segment.target: This field has a 1500 character limit.

segment.source: Screenshots
segment.target: Screenshots

segment.source: In most cases, you'll see multiple fields to provide screenshots for different types of devices.
segment.target: In most cases, you'll see multiple fields to provide screenshots for different types of devices.

segment.source: You are not required to provide separate screenshots for each device type; only one screenshot is required for your submission (though you can provide up to nine per device type).
segment.target: You are not required to provide separate screenshots for each device type; only one screenshot is required for your submission (though you can provide up to nine per device type).

segment.source: In most cases we suggest providing screenshots on as many device types as your app supports, so that customers will see images that resemble how the app will look on their device.
segment.target: In most cases we suggest providing screenshots on as many device types as your app supports, so that customers will see images that resemble how the app will look on their device.

segment.source: For more info, see App screenshots and images.
segment.target: For more info, see App screenshots and images.

segment.source: App tile icon
segment.target: App tile icon

segment.source: The app tile icon is used when displaying your app's listing to customers on Windows Phone 8.1 and earlier (and is used in your app's listing for customers on Windows 10 if you only have packages targeting Windows Phone 8.1 or earlier).
segment.target: The app tile icon is used when displaying your app's listing to customers on Windows Phone 8.1 and earlier (and is used in your app's listing for customers on Windows 10 if you only have packages targeting Windows Phone 8.1 or earlier).

segment.source: This must be a .png file measuring 300 x 300 pixels.
segment.target: This must be a .png file measuring 300 x 300 pixels.

segment.source: App features
segment.target: App features

segment.source: These are short summaries of your app's key features.
segment.target: These are short summaries of your app's key features.

segment.source: They are displayed to the customer as a bulleted list in your app's listing, along with its description.
segment.target: They are displayed to the customer as a bulleted list in your app's listing, along with its description.

segment.source: Keep these brief, with just a few words (and no more than 200 characters) per feature.
segment.target: Keep these brief, with just a few words (and no more than 200 characters) per feature.

segment.source: You may include up to 20 features.
segment.target: You may include up to 20 features.

segment.source: Note These will appear bulleted in the listing, so don't add your own bullets.
segment.target: Note These will appear bulleted in the listing, so don't add your own bullets.

segment.source: Recommended hardware
segment.target: Recommended hardware

segment.source: Describe the hardware configurations that your app requires to work properly.
segment.target: Describe the hardware configurations that your app requires to work properly.

segment.source: This is especially important if your app requires hardware that might not be available on every computer.
segment.target: This is especially important if your app requires hardware that might not be available on every computer.

segment.source: They are displayed to the customer as a bulleted list in your app's listing.
segment.target: They are displayed to the customer as a bulleted list in your app's listing.

segment.source: Keep these brief, with just a few words (and no more than 200 characters) per item.
segment.target: Keep these brief, with just a few words (and no more than 200 characters) per item.

segment.source: You may include up to 11 items.
segment.target: You may include up to 11 items.

segment.source: Note These will appear bulleted in the listing, so don't add your own bullets.
segment.target: Note These will appear bulleted in the listing, so don't add your own bullets.

segment.source: Shared fields
segment.target: Shared fields

segment.source: The fields in the Shared fields section can't be customized for a specific platform, unlike the fields shown above.
segment.target: The fields in the Shared fields section can't be customized for a specific platform, unlike the fields shown above.

segment.source: The items described below are all shared fields and will apply to all of your descriptions in a given language, regardless of operating system, even if you create platform-specific descriptions.
segment.target: The items described below are all shared fields and will apply to all of your descriptions in a given language, regardless of operating system, even if you create platform-specific descriptions.

segment.source: Keywords
segment.target: Keywords

segment.source: Keywords are single words or short phrases that are not displayed to customers, but can help your app appear in search results related to the keyword.
segment.target: Keywords are single words or short phrases that are not displayed to customers, but can help your app appear in search results related to the keyword.

segment.source: You can include up to 7 keywords with a maximum of 30 characters each.
segment.target: You can include up to 7 keywords with a maximum of 30 characters each.

segment.source: If you want to add keywords, think about the words that customers might use when searching for apps like yours, especially if they're not part of your app's name.
segment.target: If you want to add keywords, think about the words that customers might use when searching for apps like yours, especially if they're not part of your app's name.

segment.source: Be sure not to use any keywords that are not actually relevant to your app.
segment.target: Be sure not to use any keywords that are not actually relevant to your app.

segment.source: Copyright and trademark info
segment.target: Copyright and trademark info

segment.source: If you'd like to provide additional copyright and/or trademark info, enter it here.
segment.target: If you'd like to provide additional copyright and/or trademark info, enter it here.

segment.source: This field has a 200 character limit.
segment.target: This field has a 200 character limit.

segment.source: Additional license terms
segment.target: Additional license terms

segment.source: Leave this field blank if you want your app to be licensed to customers under the terms of the Standard Application License Terms (which are linked to from the App Developer Agreement).
segment.target: Leave this field blank if you want your app to be licensed to customers under the terms of the Standard Application License Terms (which are linked to from the App Developer Agreement).

segment.source: If your license terms are different from the Standard Application License Terms, enter them here.
segment.target: If your license terms are different from the Standard Application License Terms, enter them here.

segment.source: If you enter a single URL into this field, it will be displayed to customers as a link that they can click to read your additional license terms.
segment.target: If you enter a single URL into this field, it will be displayed to customers as a link that they can click to read your additional license terms.

segment.source: This is useful if your additional license terms are very long, or if you want to include clickable links or formatting in your additional license terms.
segment.target: This is useful if your additional license terms are very long, or if you want to include clickable links or formatting in your additional license terms.

segment.source: You can also up to 10,000 characters of text in this field.
segment.target: You can also up to 10,000 characters of text in this field.

segment.source: If you do that, customers will see these additional license terms displayed as plain text.
segment.target: If you do that, customers will see these additional license terms displayed as plain text.

segment.source: Website
segment.target: Website

segment.source: Enter the URL of the web page for your app.
segment.target: Enter the URL of the web page for your app.

segment.source: This URL must point to a page on your own website, not your app's web listing in the Store.
segment.target: This URL must point to a page on your own website, not your app's web listing in the Store.

segment.source: Support contact info
segment.target: Support contact info

segment.source: Enter the URL of the web page where your customers can go for support on your app, or an email address that customers can contact for support.
segment.target: Enter the URL of the web page where your customers can go for support on your app, or an email address that customers can contact for support.

segment.source: Important Microsoft doesn't provide your customers with support for your app.
segment.target: Important Microsoft doesn't provide your customers with support for your app.

segment.source: Privacy policy
segment.target: Privacy policy

segment.source: If you have a privacy policy for your app, enter its URL here.
segment.target: If you have a privacy policy for your app, enter its URL here.

segment.source: You are responsible for ensuring your app complies with privacy laws and regulations and for providing a privacy policy, if required.
segment.target: You are responsible for ensuring your app complies with privacy laws and regulations and for providing a privacy policy, if required.

segment.source: Important Microsoft doesn't provide a default privacy policy for your app.
segment.target: Important Microsoft doesn't provide a default privacy policy for your app.

segment.source: Likewise, your app is not covered by any Microsoft privacy policy.
segment.target: Likewise, your app is not covered by any Microsoft privacy policy.

segment.source: To determine if your app requires a privacy policy, review the App Developer Agreement and the Windows Store Policies.
segment.target: To determine if your app requires a privacy policy, review the App Developer Agreement and the Windows Store Policies.
